channel.title: Docker on jiahao.blog
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on jiahao.blog

item.title: Heroku x Docker x Discord bot x Kotlin
item.description: You may be wondering what’s up with the over the top, nearly fan-ship name, trust me, I was not on anything when I wrote this. I simply wanted to write about a playground project I had written to get Docker working with Heroku, specifically in the context of writing a Discord bot in Kotlin. I made a rather comprehensive guide to go with the project over on GitHub and I wish to share it here as well since it was a rather large milestone.
